1.0.name: wordpress/bbcode-widget-titles
1.0.description:
BBCode Widget Titles is a very simple, lightweight plugin that allows for the use of BBCode in styling widget titles. It currently supports the [b], [i], [u], [s], [url=], and [color=]. Simply install the plugin and BBCode will be parsed in widget titles.

This plugin has been tested to work up to 3.4.2. Please contact me if you experience any problems with this plugin or have any questions.
